rules.description: [keyboard] shift + opt + cmd + ↑ as shift + opt + cmd + →
[keyboard] Symbols // @todo: move this to a keyboard layout using ukelele
escape to esc when pressed alone, to hyper as modifier
caps_lock to esc when pressed alone, to hyper as modifier
[util] Move app to next screen and center
[util] Move app to prev screen and center
[arc] CMD P also to show url menu
